alert.note: Alert for Central Oahu; East Honolulu; Ewa Plain; Honolulu Metro; Koolau Leeward; Koolau Windward; Oahu North Shore; Olomana; Waianae Coast; Waianae Mountains (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 02 at 9:05PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Oahu in Honolulu County through 1000 PM HST... At 904 PM HST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Kaneohe Marine Base to 15 miles southwest of Waianae. Movement was south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts 35 to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Honolulu, Waimanalo, Wahiawa, Waialua, Schofield Barracks, Hawaii Kai, Ahuimanu, Punaluu, Wheeler Field, Kapolei, Waikele, Kalihi, Barbers Point, Waiahole, Moanalua, Nanakuli, Pearl City, Waipahu, Hauula and Mililani. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
